statements: SELECT * FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, research_data FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Human Rights';
SELECT * FROM legal_scholars_research_data ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, publication_date FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, research_data FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE publication_date < '2018-06-01' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%law%' ORDER BY researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, publication_date FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE researcher_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT researcher_name, publication_date FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalScholars;
SELECT scholar_name, institution FROM LegalScholars WHERE research_interests = 'Law';
SELECT scholar_name, research_interests FROM LegalScholars ORDER BY scholar_name ASC;
SELECT scholar_name, institution FROM LegalScholars WHERE institution = 'Harvard University';
SELECT scholar_name, data_title FROM LegalScholars JOIN ResearchData ON LegalScholars.scholar_id = ResearchData.scholar_id ORDER BY scholar_name DESC;
SELECT scholar_name, institution FROM LegalScholars;
SELECT * FROM LegalScholars WHERE research_interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT scholar_name, data_title FROM LegalScholars JOIN ResearchData ON LegalScholars.scholar_id = ResearchData.scholar_id;
SELECT scholar_name, research_interests, data_title FROM LegalScholars JOIN ResearchData ON LegalScholars.scholar_id = ResearchData.scholar_id WHERE ResearchData.data_description LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT scholar_name, institution, data_title FROM LegalScholars JOIN ResearchData ON LegalScholars.scholar_id = ResearchData.scholar_id WHERE institution = 'Harvard University';
SELECT * FROM legal_scholars
SELECT name, affiliation FROM legal_scholars WHERE research_interests IS NOT NULL
SELECT data_text, data_timestamp FROM research_data ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC
SELECT name, affiliation, research_interests FROM legal_scholars WHERE id = 1
SELECT user_id, access_time, accessed_table FROM access_logs WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM legal_scholars WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, affiliation, research_interests FROM legal_scholars WHERE affiliation = 'University X';
SELECT ls.name, rd.data_text, rd.data_timestamp FROM legal_scholars ls JOIN research_data rd ON ls.id = rd.scholar_id WHERE rd.data_id = 100;

SELECT ls.name AS Scholar_Name, al.access_time AS Last_Access_Time FROM legal_scholars ls JOIN access_logs al ON ls.id = al.user_id WHERE al.accessed_table = 'research_data' ORDER BY al.access_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Scholars FROM legal_scholars;
SELECT * FROM Researcher;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researcher ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Article WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT RD.data_id, RD.data_description, A.article_title FROM ResearchData RD JOIN Article A ON RD.article_id = A.article_id;

SELECT C.collaboration_name, R1.researcher_name AS researcher_1, R2.researcher_name AS researcher_2 FROM Collaboration C JOIN Researcher R1 ON C.researcher_id_1 = R1.researcher_id JOIN Researcher R2 ON C.researcher_id_2 = R2.researcher_id ORDER BY collaboration_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Researcher;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researcher WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT * FROM Article ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM Article WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT r.researcher_name, a.article_title, rd.data_description FROM Researcher r JOIN Article a ON r.researcher_id = a.researcher_id JOIN ResearchData rd ON a.article_id = rd.article_id;
SELECT * FROM scholars;
SELECT scholar_name, research_interests FROM scholars;
SELECT scholar_id, affiliation FROM scholars WHERE affiliation = 'University X';
SELECT * FROM research_data WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM collaborations WHERE start_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT scholar_name, research_interests FROM scholars ORDER BY scholar_name DESC;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_data WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' AND description LIKE '%research%';
SELECT scholar_name, dataset_name FROM scholars JOIN datasets ON scholars.scholar_id = datasets.contributor_id;
SELECT project_name, description FROM collaborations JOIN collaborations_datasets ON collaborations.collaboration_id = collaborations_datasets.collaboration_id;
